# Week 1- Overview: Climate and its variability in WAS, General introduction to python and validation of seasonal forecast of global climate centers. # Timeline
| Time | Monday | Tuesday | Wednesday | Thursday | Friday | |------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------| | **08:30 - 10:00** | Opening and Presentation of Participants | Debrief with Participants | Observational Datasets | Validation of Dynamical Seasonal Forecast | Participants Presentations on Validation | | **Break** | | | | | | | **10:30 - 12:30** | Climate and its Variability in West Africa and the Sahel | Seasonal Forecasts: Foundations, Approaches in West Africa | Validation of Dynamical Seasonal Forecast | Validation of Dynamical Seasonal Forecast | Participants Presentations on Validation | | **Break** | | | | | | | **14:00 - 17:00** | General Introduction to Python | NMME and C3S Models in Climate Data Store and IRI Data Library | Validation of Dynamical Seasonal Forecast | Validation of Dynamical Seasonal Forecast | PyCPT and Xcast Installation |
